snippet: Michael Olajide Jr., a former boxing champ, and Leila Fazel, a ballerina turned spa designer, discuss their gym, the "machine-free" Aerospace High Performance Center in downtown New York.
abstract: Michael Olajide Jr., a former boxing champ, and Leila Fazel, a ballerina turned spa designer, discuss their gym, the "machine-free" Aerospace High Performance Center in downtown New York.

byline.original: By CASEY SPOONER and ADAM DUGAS
